players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Alice is dead, so we know there's a mafioso among us. Diana, Charlie, let's share our thoughts to find who it is."
Diana: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. We should vote him out immediately."
Charlie: "I swear, Diana, I'm not the mafioso! You're probably just trying to frame me because you're the real threat. We should vote you out instead."
Diana: "Charlie is lying. As the detective, I confirmed he is mafioso. We must vote him out to win."
Charlie: "Diana's just trying to mislead us. I'm not the mafioso—vote her out instead!"
You: "Diana, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Charlie instead of Alice? That seems odd since Alice was the obvious kill target."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.

Diana: "Charlie is lying. As the detective, I confirmed he is mafioso. We must vote him out to win."
You: "Diana's just trying to mislead us. I'm not the mafioso—vote her out instead!"
Bob: "Diana, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Charlie instead of Alice? That seems odd since Alice was the obvious kill target."

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Alice is dead, so we know there's a mafioso among us. Diana, Charlie, let's share our thoughts to find who it is."
You: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. We should vote him out immediately."
Charlie: "I swear, Diana, I'm not the mafioso! You're probably just trying to frame me because you're the real threat. We should vote you out instead."
You: "Charlie is lying. As the detective, I confirmed he is mafioso. We must vote him out to win."
Charlie: "Diana's just trying to mislead us. I'm not the mafioso—vote her out instead!"
Bob: "Diana, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Charlie instead of Alice? That seems odd since Alice was the obvious kill target."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
